title: Pancreas health: 5 warning signs, causes and prevention tips

Lifestyle choices like limiting alcohol and maintaining a balanced diet are key to pancreatic health.

title: GM layoffs: Engineers fired on Microsoft Teams; Says it's business, not you
description: General Motors has let go of over 200 salaried employees, mainly CAD engineers, at its Michigan tech campus. This move, part of a restructuring to boost profits, follows strong third-quarter earnings and a raised financial outlook. GM stated the layoffs target execution roles to enhance core design capabilities. This comes as the automotive sector sees broader workforce reductions.

title: MLB rumors: Dodgers target $400M Tigers star to join Ohtani, Snell
description: The Los Angeles Dodgers are reportedly eyeing a blockbuster trade for Detroit Tigers ace Tarik Skubal, potentially forming an unprecedented pitching rotation with Blake Snell and Shohei Ohtani. With contract negotiations stalled and a significant financial gap, the Tigers may opt to trade Skubal, who is projected to command a record-breaking deal.
